detaileddescription.para: RAMDISK$(string-expression) Create a ramdisk device with the content of a separate block device who's name is in the string-expression. Returns the name of the new block device.

RAMDISK(integer-expression,integer-expression) Create a ramdisk device of X blocks each block being Y bytes, where X and Y are the two integer-expression values. Note that the block device will be unformatted, and cannot be immediately mounted to a mountpoint. Returns the name of the new block device.
